summary:
This was a breakout week driven almost entirely by one YouTube video. "5 Claude Features Most People Don't Know About" hit the algorithm sweet spot — 65% of the week's YouTube views came from that single video, and it's still climbing. The ripple effect was real: LinkedIn saw a 34% jump in impressions as you cross-posted clips, and Instagram engagement rate hit 7.9%, the highest in 90 days.

Newsletter performance was solid — the Tuesday send pulled a 48.2% open rate and 6.7% click rate, both above your trailing averages. Subject line "The AI features hiding in plain sight" clearly resonated with the YouTube audience crossover.

TikTok continues its steady climb. The short-form clips from the Claude video drove 2,341 views on Saturday alone. You're building real momentum on that platform — follower growth was 8x what it was in December.

highlights.context: Driven by '5 Claude Features' video reaching 1,890 views/day at peak
Highest in 90 days — carousel posts with AI tips are consistently outperforming
Net +22 this week. Growth accelerating — was +15/week in January

concerns.issue: Weekend impressions dropped 40% — consider scheduling posts for weekday mornings only

recommendations: Double down on the 'hidden features' content angle — it's resonating across all platforms
Create a newsletter series that expands on each Claude feature from the video
Test posting TikTok clips to Instagram Reels — your IG audience engages heavily with short-form
